org.gbif.ws.discovery.lifecycle

Class DiscoveryLifeCycle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.ws.discovery.lifecycle.DiscoveryLifeCycle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle.Listener

    public class DiscoveryLifeCycle
extends Object
implements org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle.Listener
    Listener that handles the registration process of the executing application into the Zookeeper discoveryService service.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiscoveryLifeCycle(ServiceConfiguration configuration)
      Creates an instance using the fields zkPath and zkHost of the configuration class.
